@adrianco ‚ûú /workspaces/the-goodies (main) $ blowing-off --help
Usage: blowing-off [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

  Blowing-Off: Python test client for The Goodies smart home system.

Options:
  --help  Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  connect      Connect to FunkyGibbon server.
  device       Accessory management commands (kept as 'device' for user...
  home         Home management commands.
  room         Room management commands.
  status       Show sync status.
  sync         Perform manual sync with server.
  sync-daemon  Run background sync daemon.
